title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Competencies: Pedagogical Design Workshop for Strengthening Online Education Accessibility

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with digital educational tools and at least 3 years of educational management experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: When creating online educational materials, learners can apply a WCAG 2.1 compliance checklist at over 80%
Learners can design a survey of five or more items to assess accessibility needs
Learners can present three types of alternative materials (text conversion, captions, audio descriptions) to support learners with hearing/visual impairments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
